column4: hi guys. I have a text file on a remote server with only 1G RAM, and the file is 1.2G large, and I need to edit a single line. Do not want to use "vim" for that. Any other alternatives?
I know the line number and all, if it helps
out of curiosity, why would the amount of RAM on the remote system matter...?
because if you use vim, it loads the file into ram
